name: Cosmoflorist
description:
Become a Florist

A first person game where you plant, care for flowers and arrange them into bouquets for your trusty partner, H.A.N.D.S to deliver across the galaxy. All the while enjoying your life listening to lo-fi music in space. 

Features

  • Planting and caring for flowers.
  • Bouquet arrangement according.
  • Deliver bouquet across the galaxy.
  • A drone friend named H.A.N.D.S that will deliver your flowers for you and keep you company.
  • An in-game lo-fi radio.
  • Your own spacehab with a greenhouse.
  • Earn cozmocoins to purchase more plants and greenhouse upgrades.
